title: Understanding Font Size Increase
text: Increasing the font size of a cell entry can make it more noticeable. Why might this be important?

title: Consider Accessibility
text: Think about how increasing font size can help people with different needs. What are some reasons for making text larger?

hintAnswer: to make the entry stand out and easier to read.
title: Purpose of Increasing Font Size
text: What is one of the main reasons for increasing the font size of a cell entry?
choices: to make the entry stand out and easier to read
to allow the visually impaired to read it
